00024 
00025 ME_Sample mesample(const vector<Token> &vt,
00026                  int i,
00027          const string & pos_left2,
00028          const string & pos_left1,
00029          const string & pos_right1,
00030          const string & pos_right2)
00031 {
00032   ME_Sample sample;
00033 
00034   string str = vt[i].str;
00035 
00036   sample.label = vt[i].pos;
00037 
00038   sample.features.push_back("W0_" + str);
00039   string prestr = "BOS";
00040   if (i > 0) prestr = vt[i-1].str;
00041   //  string prestr2 = "BOS2";
00042   //  if (i > 1) prestr2 = normalize(vt[i-2].str);
00043   string poststr = "EOS";
00044   if (i < (int)vt.size()-1) poststr = vt[i+1].str;
00045   //  string poststr2 = "EOS2";
00046   //  if (i < (int)vt.size()-2) poststr2 = normalize(vt[i+2].str);
00047 
00048   if (!ONLY_VERTICAL_FEATURES) {
00049     sample.features.push_back("W-1_" + prestr);
00050     sample.features.push_back("W+1_" + poststr);
00051 
00052     sample.features.push_back("W-10_" + prestr + "_" + str);
00053     sample.features.push_back("W0+1_" + str  + "_" + poststr);
00054   }
00055 
00056   for (int j = 1; j <= 10; j++) {
00057     char buf[1000];
00058     if (str.size() >= j) {
00059       sprintf(buf, "suf%d_%s", j, str.substr(str.size() - j).c_str());
00060       sample.features.push_back(buf);
00061     }
00062     if (str.size() >= j) {
00063       sprintf(buf, "pre%d_%s", j, str.substr(0, j).c_str());
00064       sample.features.push_back(buf);
00065     }
00066   }
00067   // L
00068   if (pos_left1 != "") {
00069     sample.features.push_back("P-1_" + pos_left1);
00070     sample.features.push_back("P-1W0_"  + pos_left1 + "_" + str);
00071   }
00072   // L2
00073   if (pos_left2 != "") {
00074     sample.features.push_back("P-2_" + pos_left2);
00075   }
00076   // R
00077   if (pos_right1 != "") {
00078     sample.features.push_back("P+1_" + pos_right1);
00079     sample.features.push_back("P+1W0_"  + pos_right1 + "_" + str);
00080   }
00081   // R2
00082   if (pos_right2 != "") {
00083     sample.features.push_back("P+2_" + pos_right2);
00084   }
00085   // LR
00086   if (pos_left1 != "" && pos_right1 != "") {
00087     sample.features.push_back("P-1+1_" + pos_left1 + "_" + pos_right1);
00088     sample.features.push_back("P-1W0P+1_"  + pos_left1 + "_" + str + "_" + pos_right1);
00089   }
00090   // LL
00091   if (pos_left1 != "" && pos_left2 != "") {
00092     sample.features.push_back("P-2-1_" + pos_left2 + "_" + pos_left1);
00093     //    sample.features.push_back("P-1W0_"  + pos_left + "_" + str);
00094   }
00095   // RR
00096   if (pos_right1 != "" && pos_right2 != "") {
00097     sample.features.push_back("P+1+2_" + pos_right1 + "_" + pos_right2);
00098     //    sample.features.push_back("P-1W0_"  + pos_left + "_" + str);
00099   }
00100   // LLR
00101   if (pos_left1 != "" && pos_left2 != "" && pos_right1 != "") {
00102     sample.features.push_back("P-2-1+1_" + pos_left2 + "_" + pos_left1 + "_" + pos_right1);
00103     //    sample.features.push_back("P-1W0_"  + pos_left + "_" + str);
00104   }
00105   // LRR
00106   if (pos_left1 != "" && pos_right1 != "" && pos_right2 != "") {
00107     sample.features.push_back("P-1+1+2_" + pos_left1 + "_" + pos_right1 + "_" + pos_right2);
00108     //    sample.features.push_back("P-1W0_"  + pos_left + "_" + str);
00109   }
00110   // LLRR
00111   if (pos_left2 != "" && pos_left1 != "" && pos_right1 != "" && pos_right2 != "") {
00112     sample.features.push_back("P-2-1+1+2_" + pos_left2 + "_" + pos_left1 + "_" + pos_right1 + "_" + pos_right2);
00113     //    sample.features.push_back("P-1W0_"  + pos_left + "_" + str);
00114   }
00115 
00116   for (int j = 0; j < str.size(); j++) {
00117     if (isdigit(str[j])) {
00118       sample.features.push_back("CONTAIN_NUMBER");
00119       break;
00120     }
00121   }
00122   for (int j = 0; j < str.size(); j++) {
00123     if (isupper(str[j])) {
00124       sample.features.push_back("CONTAIN_UPPER");
00125       break;
00126     }
00127   }
00128   for (int j = 0; j < str.size(); j++) {
00129     if (str[j] == '-') {
00130       sample.features.push_back("CONTAIN_HYPHEN");
00131       break;
00132     }
00133   }
00134 
00135   bool allupper = true;
00136   for (int j = 0; j < str.size(); j++) {
00137     if (!isupper(str[j])) {
00138       allupper = false;
00139       break;
00140     }
00141   }
00142   if (allupper)
00143     sample.features.push_back("ALL_UPPER");
00144 
00145   return sample;
00146 }
00147 
00148 ME_Sample mesample(const vector<Token> &vt, int i, const string & prepos)
00149          //         const string & prepos2)
00150 {
00151   ME_Sample sample;
00152 
00153   string str = vt[i].str;
00154 
00155   sample.label = normalize(vt[i].pos);
00156 
00157   sample.features.push_back("W0_" + str);
00158   string prestr = "BOS";
00159   if (i > 0) prestr = normalize(vt[i-1].str);
00160   string prestr2 = "BOS2";
00161   if (i > 1) prestr2 = normalize(vt[i-2].str);
00162   string poststr = "EOS";
00163   if (i < (int)vt.size()-1) poststr = normalize(vt[i+1].str);
00164   string poststr2 = "EOS2";
00165   if (i < (int)vt.size()-2) poststr2 = normalize(vt[i+2].str);
00166   sample.features.push_back("W-1_" + prestr);
00167   sample.features.push_back("W+1_" + poststr);
00168 
00169   sample.features.push_back("W-10_" + prestr + "_" + str);
00170   sample.features.push_back("W0+1_" + str  + "_" + poststr);
00171 
00172   if (str.size() >= 3)
00173     sample.features.push_back("suf2_" + str.substr(str.size() - 2));
00174   if (str.size() >= 4)
00175     sample.features.push_back("suf3_" + str.substr(str.size() - 3));
00176   if (str.size() >= 5)
00177     sample.features.push_back("suf4_" + str.substr(str.size() - 4));
00178   if (str.size() >= 6)
00179     sample.features.push_back("suf5_" + str.substr(str.size() - 5));
00180   sample.features.push_back("P-1_" + prepos);
00181   sample.features.push_back("P-1W0_"  + prepos + "_" + str);
00182 
00183   if (isupper(str[0]))
00184     sample.features.push_back("ISUPPER");
00185   return sample;
00186 }
00187 
00188 double entropy(const vector<double>& v)
00189 {
00190   double sum = 0, maxp = 0;
00191   for (int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++) {
00192     if (v[i] == 0) continue;
00193     sum += v[i] * log(v[i]);
00194     maxp = max(maxp, v[i]);
00195   }
00196   return -maxp;
00197 //    return -sum;
00198 }

00200 int
00201 bidir_train(const vector<Sentence> & vs, int para)
00202 {
00203   //  vme.clear();
00204   //  vme.resize(16);
00205 
00206   for (int t = 0; t < 16; t++) {
00207     if (t != 15 && t != 0) continue;
00208   //  for (int t = 15; t >= 0; t--) {
00209     vector<ME_Sample> train;
00210 
00211     if (para != -1 && t % 4 != para) continue;
00212     //    if (t % 2 == 1) continue;
00213     cerr << "type = " << t << endl;
00214     cerr << "extracting features...";
00215     int n = 0;
00216     for (vector<Sentence>::const_iterator i = vs.begin(); i != vs.end(); i++) {
00217       const Sentence & s = *i;
00218       for (int j = 0; j < s.size(); j++) {
00219 
00220         string pos_left1 = "BOS", pos_left2 = "BOS2";
00221         if (j >= 1) pos_left1 = s[j-1].pos;
00222         if (j >= 2) pos_left2 = s[j-2].pos;
00223         string pos_right1 = "EOS", pos_right2 = "EOS2";
00224         if (j <= int(s.size()) - 2) pos_right1 = s[j+1].pos;
00225         if (j <= int(s.size()) - 3) pos_right2 = s[j+2].pos;
00226         if ( (t & 0x8) == 0 ) pos_left2 = "";
00227         if ( (t & 0x4) == 0 ) pos_left1 = "";
00228         if ( (t & 0x2) == 0 ) pos_right1 = "";
00229         if ( (t & 0x1) == 0 ) pos_right2 = "";
00230 
00231         train.push_back(mesample(s, j, pos_left2, pos_left1, pos_right1, pos_right2));
00232       }
00233       //      if (n++ > 1000) break;
00234     }
00235     cerr << "done" << endl;
00236 
00237     ME_Model m;
00238     //    m.set_heldout(1000,0);
00239     //    m.train(train, 2, 1000, 0);
00240     m.train(train, 2, 0, 1);
00241     char buf[1000];
00242     sprintf(buf, "model.bidir.%d", t);
00243     m.save_to_file(buf);
00244 
00245   }
00246 
00247 }

00250 
00251 void generate_hypotheses(const int order, const Hypothesis & h,
00252                          const multimap<string, string> & tag_dictionary,
00253                          const vector<ME_Model> & vme,
00254                          list<Hypothesis> & vh)
00255 {
00256   int n = h.vt.size();
00257   int pred_position = -1;
00258   double min_ent = 999999;
00259   string pred = "";
00260   double pred_prob = 0;
00261   for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00262     if (h.vt[j].prd != "") continue;
00263     double ent = h.vent[j];
00264     if (ent < min_ent) {
00265       //        pred = h.vvp[j].begin()->first;
00266       //        pred_prob = h.vvp[j].begin()->second;
00267       min_ent = ent;
00268       pred_position = j;
00269     }
00270   }
00271   assert(pred_position >= 0 && pred_position < n);
00272 
00273   for (vector<pair<string, double> >::const_iterator k = h.vvp[pred_position].begin();
00274        k != h.vvp[pred_position].end(); k++) {
00275     Hypothesis newh = h;
00276 
00277     newh.vt[pred_position].prd = k->first;
00278     newh.order[pred_position] = order + 1;
00279     newh.prob = h.prob * k->second;
00280 
00281     // update the neighboring predictions
00282     for (int j = pred_position - UPDATE_WINDOW_SIZE; j <= pred_position + UPDATE_WINDOW_SIZE; j++) {
00283       if (j < 0 || j > n-1) continue;
00284       if (newh.vt[j].prd == "") newh.Update(j, tag_dictionary, vme);
00285     }
00286     vh.push_back(newh);
00287   }
00288 
00289 
00290 }
00291 
00292 void bidir_decode_beam(vector<Token> & vt,
00293                   const multimap<string, string> & tag_dictionary,
00294                   const vector<ME_Model> & vme)
00295 {
00296   int n = vt.size();
00297   if (n == 0) return;
00298 
00299   list<Hypothesis> vh;
00300   Hypothesis h(vt, tag_dictionary, vme);
00301   vh.push_back(h);
00302 
00303   for (size_t i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00304     list<Hypothesis> newvh;
00305     for (list<Hypothesis>::const_iterator j = vh.begin(); j != vh.end(); j++) {
00306       generate_hypotheses(i, *j, tag_dictionary, vme, newvh);
00307     }
00308     newvh.sort();
00309     while (newvh.size() > BEAM_NUM) {
00310       newvh.pop_front();
00311     }
00312     vh = newvh;
00313   }
00314 
00315   h = vh.back();
00316   for (size_t k = 0; k < n; k++) {
00317     //    cout << h.vt[k].str << "/" << h.vt[k].prd << "/" << h.order[k] << " ";
00318     vt[k].prd = h.vt[k].prd;
00319   }
00320   //  cout << endl;
00321 
00322 
00323 }

00325 void
00326 decode_no_context(vector<Token> & vt, const ME_Model & me_none)
00327 {
00328   int n = vt.size();
00329   if (n == 0) return;
00330 
00331   for (size_t i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00332     ME_Sample mes = mesample(vt, i, "", "", "", "");
00333     me_none.classify(mes);
00334     vt[i].prd = mes.label;
00335   }
00336 
00337   for (size_t k = 0; k < n; k++) {
00338     cout << vt[k].str << "/" << vt[k].prd << " ";
00339   }
00340   cout << endl;
00341 
00342 }

00346 string
00347 bidir_postag(const string & s, const vector<ME_Model> & vme)
00348 {
00349   list<string> lt;
00350   tokenize(s, lt);
00351   /*
00352   istringstream is(s);
00353   string t;
00354   while (is >> t) {
00355     lt.push_back(t);
00356   }
00357   */
00358 
00359   vector<Token> vt;
00360   for (list<string>::const_iterator i = lt.begin(); i != lt.end(); i++) {
00361     string s = *i;
00362     //    s = paren_converter.Ptb2Pos(s);
00363     vt.push_back(Token(s, "?"));
00364   }
00365 
00366   const multimap<string, string> dummy;
00367   //  bidir_decode_search(vt, dummy, vme);
00368   bidir_decode_beam(vt, dummy, vme);
00369 
00370   string tmp;
00371   for (size_t i = 0; i < vt.size(); i++) {
00372     string s = vt[i].str;
00373     string p = vt[i].prd;
00374     //     s = paren_converter.Pos2Ptb(s);
00375     //    p = paren_converter.Pos2Ptb(p);
00376     if (i == 0) tmp += s + "/" + p;
00377     else        tmp += " " + s + "/" + p;
00378   }
00379   return tmp;
00380 }

00382 
00383 int push_stop_watch()
00384 {
00385   static struct timeval start_time, end_time;
00386   static bool start = true;
00387   if (start) {
00388     gettimeofday(&start_time, NULL);
00389     start = false;
00390     return 0;
00391   }
00392 
00393   gettimeofday(&end_time, NULL);
00394   int elapse_msec = (end_time.tv_sec - start_time.tv_sec) * 1000 +
00395     (int)((end_time.tv_usec - start_time.tv_usec) * 0.001);
00396   cerr << elapse_msec << " msec" << endl;
00397   start = true;
00398   return elapse_msec;
00399 }

00401 void
00402 bidir_postagging(vector<Sentence> & vs,
00403                  const multimap<string, string> & tag_dictionary,
00404                  const vector<ME_Model> & vme)
00405 {
00406   int num_classes = vme[0].num_classes();
00407 
00408   cerr << "now tagging";
00409   push_stop_watch();
00410   int n = 0, ntokens = 0;
00411   for (vector<Sentence>::iterator i = vs.begin(); i != vs.end(); i++) {
00412     Sentence & s = *i;
00413     ntokens += s.size();
00414     //    if (s.size() > 2) continue;
00415     bidir_decode_beam(s, tag_dictionary, vme);
00416     //    bidir_decode_search(s, tag_dictionary, vme);
00417     //decode_no_context(s, vme[0]);
00418 
00419     //    cout << n << endl;
00420     for (size_t k = 0; k < s.size(); k++) {
00421       cout << s[k].str << "/" << s[k].prd << " ";
00422     }
00423     cout << endl;
00424     //    if (n > 100) break;
00425 
00426     if (n++ % 10 == 0) cerr << ".";
00427   }
00428   cerr << endl;
00429   int msec = push_stop_watch();
00430   cerr << ntokens / (msec/1000.0) << " tokens / sec" << endl;
00431 }
